MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in The Beeches and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground electricity network fault near the Brookfield substation and due to the repairs required,  we now expect your supply to be restored by 3pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40am on Monday 14th December 2020.
